topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack(R) 1.1: Making an Image Public with HPE Helion OpenStack(R)

body.p: When you create a image or a snapshot image, as an admin, you can determine if the snapshot is available only in the current project or to all projects in the domain.

li.p: Launch the HPE Helion OpenStack(R) Helion Dashboard.
Click the Images link on the Project dashboard Compute panel.
In the Images screen, for the image you want to protect, click More > Edit.
In the Update Image screen, select Public.
The image is public and available to all projects in the domain.
